name: dog
description: A friendly dog with a wagging tail
deathMessages: whimpers softly before falling silent
gives one last friendly wag of its tail and closes its eyes
lets out a sorrowful howl and collapses

name: cat
description: A sleepy cat with soft fur
deathMessages: lets out a final sad meow, and dies
hisses one last time before going limp
purrs softly as it closes its eyes forever

name: goblin
description: A small, green-skinned creature with a wicked grin. It looks ready to attack anyone who comes near.
attackTexts: stabs at $TARGET$ with a rusty dagger
deathMessages: screams in agony and falls to the ground, twitching
clutches its wounds and curses you before dying
gurgles on its own blood and collapses in a heap

name: wolf
description: A large gray wolf with gleaming yellow eyes and sharp teeth. It watches you warily.
deathMessages: snarls defiantly one last time before collapsing
whines pitifully and falls to the ground with glazed eyes
howls mournfully as its strength fades away

name: Marcus the Merchant
description: A friendly merchant selling basic goods.
deathMessages: Marcus runs away!

name: Gareth the Trainer
description: A grizzled veteran warrior with scars crisscrossing his arms. He can train adventurers in the ways of all basic combat classes.
attackTexts: Gareth demonstrates a painful strike on you!
deathMessages: Gareth falls, muttering about his old war wounds...

name: Sir Bartholomew
description: A heavily armored knight with a stern expression. His shield bears the marks of countless battles. He trains warriors in the art of combat.
attackTexts: Sir Bartholomew delivers a crushing blow!
deathMessages: Sir Bartholomew falls with honor...

name: Archmage Elara
description: An elderly woman in flowing robes, her eyes shimmer with arcane energy. Ancient tomes float around her as she studies the mysteries of magic.
attackTexts: Archmage Elara strikes you with a bolt of lightning!
deathMessages: Archmage Elara fades into magical mist...

name: Shadow
description: You can barely see this figure lurking in the darkness. When they move, it's with the grace of smoke on the wind. They train those who wish to walk unseen.
deathMessages: Shadow vanishes into the shadows forever...

name: Sister Mercy
description: A serene woman in white robes, her hands glow with a soft golden light. She dedicates her life to teaching the healing arts.
attackTexts: Sister Mercy channels painful light at you!
deathMessages: Sister Mercy's light fades peacefully...

name: Goldwin the Banker
description: A stern-faced man in a crisp suit, his fingers stained with ink from ledger work. He peers at you over wire-rimmed spectacles.
attackTexts: Goldwin whacks you with a heavy ledger!
deathMessages: Goldwin gasps 'My ledgers!' and collapses...

name: Elder Tobias
description: A kindly old man with a long white beard and twinkling blue eyes. He wears simple farmer's clothes but carries himself with quiet authority. As the elder of Millbrook Village, he knows everyone and everything that happens here.
attackTexts: Elder Tobias whacks you with his walking stick!
deathMessages: Elder Tobias sighs and slumps against the well...

name: Martha the Shopkeeper
description: A plump, cheerful woman in an apron, her graying hair pulled back in a practical bun. She runs Millbrook's general store with a firm but fair hand, always ready with a bit of gossip or advice for travelers.
attackTexts: Martha swats you with a broom!
deathMessages: Martha collapses behind her counter...

name: Barley the Innkeeper
description: A rotund, jovial man with a ruddy face and a booming laugh. He's been running the Sleeping Sheep for thirty years and prides himself on his hearty stew. His belly shakes when he laughs, which is often.
attackTexts: Barley smashes a tankard over your head!
deathMessages: Barley slumps against the bar with a final sigh...

name: Priestess Willow
description: A young woman in flowing green robes, her auburn hair adorned with wildflowers. She tends the village shrine to Aelindra with quiet devotion and offers blessings to travelers.
attackTexts: Priestess Willow's eyes flash with divine anger!
deathMessages: Priestess Willow's light fades from her eyes...

name: field rat
description: A large brown rat the size of a small dog. Its beady eyes gleam with cunning, and its yellowed teeth look sharp enough to gnaw through leather. These vermin are a constant nuisance to farmers.
deathMessages: squeaks once and goes still
twitches and expires with a final squeal
curls up and dies, its beady eyes glazing over

name: wild boar
description: A bristly, tusked pig gone feral. Its small eyes gleam with aggression, and foam flecks its snout. Wild boars are territorial and will charge anyone who gets too close.
deathMessages: squeals in rage and collapses, foaming at the mouth
stumbles and falls, its last breath a defiant grunt
crashes to the ground, its tusks digging into the dirt

name: giant spider
description: A spider the size of a large dog, its black carapace gleaming in the light. Eight malevolent eyes watch your every move, and venom drips from its fangs. Webs trail from its spinnerets.
deathMessages: curls its legs inward and dies
spasms violently and goes still
leaks dark ichor and collapses into a heap

name: Thornwood Guard
description: A vigilant guard in chainmail armor bearing the thorny oak emblem of Thornwood Town. They carry a well-maintained sword and shield, and their eyes constantly scan for trouble.
attackTexts: The guard strikes you with practiced precision!
deathMessages: The guard falls, their duty done...

name: Gerald the Trader
description: A prosperous-looking merchant in fine clothes, his fingers adorned with gold rings. He deals in general goods and always seems to have what travelers need - for a price.
attackTexts: Gerald throws his ledger at you!
deathMessages: Gerald clutches his coin purse as he falls...

name: Grimjaw the Smith
description: A massive man with arms like tree trunks and a face marked by old burns. His leather apron is scorched and stained, and his hands are calloused from years at the forge. He speaks little but his weapons speak volumes.
attackTexts: Grimjaw swings his hammer at you!
deathMessages: Grimjaw falls against his anvil with a final clang...

name: Helena Ironhide
description: A muscular woman with short-cropped gray hair and keen eyes that assess your measurements at a glance. She crafts the finest armor in the Vale, each piece a testament to her skill.
attackTexts: Helena strikes you with a gauntlet!
deathMessages: Helena falls amid her finest work...

name: Vera Wanderfoot
description: A wiry woman in her fifties with weathered skin and bright eyes. A retired adventurer, she now runs an outfitting shop and loves swapping stories with those brave enough to venture into the wild.
attackTexts: Vera trips you with an expert move!
deathMessages: Vera sighs, 'One last adventure...'

name: Mayor Aldric Thornwood
description: A tall, dignified man in his sixties with silver hair and a neatly trimmed beard. He wears the chain of office over fine but practical clothes. His family has led Thornwood Town for generations.
attackTexts: Mayor Thornwood strikes you with his cane of office!
deathMessages: Mayor Thornwood collapses with dignity...

name: Red Thorn
description: A tough-looking woman with fiery red hair and a scar across her cheek. She runs the Thorny Rose with an iron fist and has been known to personally throw out troublemakers. She's also the best source of local rumors.
attackTexts: Red Thorn smashes a bottle over your head!
deathMessages: Red Thorn falls behind her bar...

name: Apprentice Finwick
description: A nervous young man in slightly singed robes, constantly checking lists and muttering about inventory. He manages the Tower's magical supply shop under the watchful eye of Archmage Elara.
attackTexts: Finwick hurls a minor spell at you!
deathMessages: Finwick's robes slowly stop smoldering...

name: Thornwood wolf
description: A large gray wolf with gleaming yellow eyes, its coat matted with burrs and forest debris. These wolves are larger and fiercer than their lowland cousins, adapted to hunting in the dense undergrowth.
attackTexts: lunges at $TARGET$'s throat with bared fangs
circles around and attacks $TARGET$ from behind
deathMessages: howls mournfully as it collapses
snarls one last time and goes limp
whimpers and falls, blood staining its gray fur

name: Thornwood spider
description: A massive spider with a body the size of a shield, its legs spanning several feet. Its carapace is mottled brown and green for camouflage among the forest leaves. Its venom is especially potent.
deathMessages: curls its legs inward and dies
leaks green ichor as it expires
thrashes violently and goes still

name: giant Thornwood spider
description: A monstrous spider, queen of its nest. Its bloated body is covered in coarse hairs, and its mandibles drip with venom that could kill a horse. Countless smaller spiders scuttle in its wake.
attackTexts: injects $TARGET$ with a massive dose of venom
wraps $TARGET$ in layer upon layer of webbing
deathMessages: lets out a hideous screech and collapses
thrashes in its death throes, spraying ichor
curls into a ball and expires with a final shudder

name: brown bear
description: A massive brown bear standing seven feet tall on its hind legs. Its claws are as long as daggers, and its roar can be heard for miles. It views you as either a threat or a meal.
deathMessages: roars one last time and collapses with a thunderous crash
stumbles and falls, the light fading from its eyes
lets out a final growl and lies still

name: forest bandit
description: A rough-looking outlaw in mismatched armor, their face hidden behind a cloth mask. They prey on travelers through the forest, and their eyes gleam with dangerous intent.
attackTexts: slashes at $TARGET$ with a notched blade
tries to trip $TARGET$ and go for the killing blow
feints left and strikes $TARGET$ from the right
deathMessages: curses and falls to their knees before collapsing
gasps 'The boss will... avenge...' and dies
reaches for a pouch of coins and goes still

name: Scarface the Bandit Leader
description: A cruel-looking man with a distinctive scar running from forehead to chin. He wears better armor than his followers and carries a wicked-looking sword. His reputation for brutality is well-earned.
attackTexts: executes a vicious combination attack on $TARGET$
laughs cruelly as he slashes at $TARGET$
kicks $TARGET$ and follows up with a sword thrust
deathMessages: snarls 'This isn't over!' and collapses
reaches for a hidden dagger but goes limp
falls to his knees, his scar pale against his graying face

name: cave goblin
description: A small, wiry creature with sickly pale green skin adapted to life underground. Its eyes are large and gleaming in the darkness, and it clutches a crude weapon made from a sharpened bone.
attackTexts: stabs at $TARGET$ with a bone shiv
deathMessages: screams and falls, clutching its wound
hisses and collapses into a heap
gurgles something in goblin and dies

name: goblin archer
description: A goblin with slightly better equipment than its fellows, wielding a shortbow made from scavenged wood and sinew. It prefers to attack from a distance, its aim surprisingly good for such a small creature.
deathMessages: tries to nock one last arrow and fails
falls backward, its bow clattering away
screams a goblin curse and collapses

name: goblin shaman
description: An older goblin draped in bones, feathers, and strange totems. It mutters constantly in the goblin tongue, and its hands crackle with dark magic. The other goblins treat it with fearful reverence.
attackTexts: hurls a bolt of dark energy at $TARGET$
deathMessages: shrieks as its magic turns against it
collapses, its totems falling silent
mutters a final curse and expires

name: cave troll
description: A massive, misshapen creature standing twice the height of a man. Its gray-green skin is covered with warts and patches of coarse hair. It stinks of rot and carries a tree trunk as a club. Intelligence glimmers dully in its small eyes.
attackTexts: tries to grab $TARGET$ in one huge fist
deathMessages: roars in disbelief and topples like a felled tree
clutches its wounds and crashes to the ground
lets out a pitiful moan and dies

name: Grulkak the Goblin Chieftain
description: The largest and meanest goblin in the tribe, Grulkak has killed his way to the top. He wears a crown made from a human skull and carries a wickedly serrated sword. His cunning is matched only by his cruelty.
attackTexts: roars and charges at $TARGET$ with his serrated blade
feints and strikes $TARGET$ from an unexpected angle
calls for his guards while slashing at $TARGET$
deathMessages: screams 'Impossible!' as he falls from his throne
clutches his skull crown as he dies
promises revenge with his dying breath

name: marsh zombie
description: The waterlogged corpse of some unfortunate traveler, animated by dark magic. Its flesh is bloated and gray, and it moves with jerky, unnatural motions. Empty eyes stare from a rotting face.
attackTexts: tries to bite $TARGET$ with decayed teeth
deathMessages: collapses into a heap of putrid flesh
lets out a final moan and goes still
falls apart as the dark magic fades

name: bog serpent
description: A massive snake adapted to life in the marsh, its scales mottled brown and green. It can grow up to twenty feet long and is perfectly camouflaged in the murky water. Its venom causes paralysis.
attackTexts: sinks its fangs into $TARGET$, injecting venom
deathMessages: thrashes violently and goes limp
hisses one last time and dies
uncoils slowly as life leaves its body

name: Murklurk the Swamp Hag
description: A hideous crone with greenish skin and tangled hair like swamp weeds. Her eyes glow with malevolent intelligence, and she cackles as she stirs a bubbling cauldron. She knows dark secrets and darker magic.
attackTexts: hurls a glob of acid at $TARGET$
deathMessages: shrieks as her magic consumes her
melts into a puddle of foul ichor
cackles 'You'll pay for this!' and dissolves

name: drowned knight
description: The animated corpse of a warrior who died in the marsh long ago. Rusted armor clings to its waterlogged frame, and it still carries the sword it died holding. Its hollow eyes burn with spectral light.
attackTexts: executes a practiced thrust at $TARGET$'s heart
deathMessages: falls to its knees and crumbles to rust
lets out a ghostly sigh and collapses
reaches toward something unseen and goes still

name: The Marsh Lord
description: A towering figure of corrupted majesty, the Marsh Lord was once a noble guardian of this land. Now his form is bloated with dark power, his armor fused to rotting flesh. He guards the sunken temple with eternal vigilance, his eyes burning with cold fire.
attackTexts: brings down his massive blade in a devastating arc at $TARGET$
summons tendrils of dark water to drag $TARGET$ under
roars with the voice of the drowned dead and strikes $TARGET$
deathMessages: staggers back, dark energy pouring from his wounds
lets out a final, mournful howl and collapses
reaches toward the sealed door and whispers 'At last... rest...'
